game.title: The Lost Temple of the Moon Goddess
game.objective: Retrieve a rare artifact from the lost temple before it falls into the wrong hands.
game.description: The village elder has approached you with a plea for help. The ancient Temple of the Moon Goddess, hidden deep within the nearby forest, is on the verge of collapse. Rumors whisper that the temple holds a powerful artifact, one that could grant immense power to its finder.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces and a blessing from the village elder

tasks.objective: Gather information about the temple's location and layout
tasks.description: Speak with the local guide, Gorvoth, who has knowledge of the forest and its secrets.
tasks.location: The Guide's Hut, in the heart of the village

tasks.objective: Reach the temple before it collapses
tasks.description: Make your way to the Temple of the Moon Goddess, navigating through treacherous terrain and avoiding any obstacles.
tasks.location: The Lost Temple of the Moon Goddess, deep in the nearby forest

tasks.objective: Retrieve the artifact from within the temple
tasks.description: Once inside, navigate through the crumbling structure to reach the chamber where the artifact is hidden.
